___skipGit.description: When true, does not initialize a git repository.

___version.description: The version of the Angular CLI to use.

___linkCli.description: When true, links the CLI to the global version (internal development only).

___newProjectRoot.description: The path where new projects will be created.

___skipInstall.description: When true, does not install packages for dependencies.

___minimal.description: When true, creates a workspace without any testing frameworks. (Use for learning purposes only.)
